items.name: The Volcanic Black Rocks Coast
items.short_description: Explore the dramatic, rugged coastline shaped by ancient volcanic eruptions, forming unique black rock formations against the turquoise sea. A stunning testament to St. Kitts' fiery past, perfect for dramatic photos.

items.name: Timothy Hill's Dual Coast Panorama
items.short_description: Capture the breathtaking vista where the calm Caribbean Sea meets the wild Atlantic Ocean, separated by a narrow strip of land. This iconic viewpoint offers one of St. Kitts' most famous photo opportunities.
items.location_hint: South Peninsula, between Frigate Bay and South Friar's Bay

items.name: Tropical Splendor at Romney Manor Gardens
items.short_description: Wander through the lush botanical gardens surrounding historic Romney Manor, home to vibrant tropical flowers, towering trees, and the ancient Saman Tree. Discover the beauty that inspires the famed Caribelle Batik designs.

items.name: Vibrant Flavors of Basseterre Market
items.short_description: Immerse yourself in the bustling heart of local life at Basseterre's Public Market, where vibrant stalls overflow with fresh produce, spices, and local crafts. Experience the authentic sights, sounds, and tastes of St. Kitts.
